section2CmdHdr.Title: Section
section2CmdHdr.ShortHelp: Cuts through objects using a section plane, to see and access details inside the object, and to measure hidden items.
section2CmdHdr.LongHelp:
In the context toolbar, choose options to customize the section (cut side, orientation, viewpoint, etc.).

  • To rotate the plane, drag its edges.
  • To resize the plane, drag its corners.
  • To position the plane on a specific surface of the object, drag the blue central sphere towards that surface.
  • To translate the plane, drag its surface, or use the slider if available.
LockUnlockSectionHdr.Title: Hide or Show Section Plane
LockUnlockSectionHdr.ShortHelp: Toggles the visibility of the section planes already created.
LockUnlockSectionHdr.LongHelp: Hiding the section plane allows you to view the cut elements more clearly and enables easier access.
sectionCmdHdr.Title: Section
sectionCmdHdr.ShortHelp: Cuts through objects using a section plane, to see and access details inside these objects.
sectionCmdHdr.LongHelp: In the context toolbar, choose options to customize the section (cut side, orientation, viewpoint, etc.).
